context: Analyze this seated forward fold pose and identify comprehensive transition relationships. Wide-Legged Seated Forward Fold (Upavistha Konasana) Forward fold with legs wide in seated position. Consider the Inner thigh flexibility, spinal mobility, hip opening. Analyze transitions that flow naturally from this pose and evaluate both immediate possibilities and progressive developments. Factor in modifications for different ability levels and the pose's role in creating balanced sequences.

practitioner.position: Forward fold with legs wide in seated position
practitioner.primaryFocus: Inner thigh flexibility, spinal mobility, hip opening

specificNeeds: Inner thigh flexibility, spinal mobility, hip opening
